Articles.Content:
So, sometime a few days ago I lost the ability to load ships in the VAB. I've also been messing around with it a bit, and don't think the save function works either. Ships I had made before this "glitch" are still there, and I can load them from the SPH.

I'm not really sure what happened to cause this. Any ideas?

Edit:

I went ahead and checked the functionality of the VAB in different profiles, and everything worked there. It's only in my main career mode profile.

Edited January 18, 2015 by WDude4k

You've likely got a busted craft file in your Saves\[saveName]\Ships\VAB folder. If you open the debug log (Alt+F2) from the VAB, the errors it shows might point you in the right direction, but if not you should be able to spot the broken file by its file size -- broken craft files typically have a significantly smaller file size than normal. You can check it by opening the file in Notepad, or another text editor; the file will end abruptly, or be missing sections.
Ah, yep. Once I removed the broken file it all went back to normal. Thanks!
thx , i can stop banging my head against a wall now.
Thanks for the answer to this. Saved my career save. You're a star!
